name: Drimare Universe Friendsim
description:
You're a human who just woke up in a strange dream world, what will you do? Make friends with the inhabitants, of course!

A friendship simulator for some OCs from my original world Drimare Universe! If all goes well and I don't get bored of this, I'll be adding other characters :D It's just a small visual novel project inspired on games like Hiveswap Friendsim and Pesterquest

This is my first visual novel and there's a bunch of codes borrowed from other games since I'm not particularly knowledgeable in programing, so excuse the spaghetti code LOL

I tried to fix most weird bugs, but if something else shows up then do let me know so I can fix it!

Drimare Universe Wikia - http://drimareun.wikia.com/

Twitter - https://twitter.com/DrimareUniverse
